00011 NSString* const ASIS3AccessPolicyPrivate = @"private";
00012 NSString* const ASIS3AccessPolicyPublicRead = @"public-read";
00013 NSString* const ASIS3AccessPolicyPublicReadWrote = @"public-read-write";
00014 NSString* const ASIS3AccessPolicyAuthenticatedRead = @"authenticated-read";
00015 
00016 static NSString *sharedAccessKey = nil;
00017 static NSString *sharedSecretAccessKey = nil;

00019 // Private stuff
00020 @interface ASIS3Request ()
00021         - (void)parseError;
00022         + (NSData *)HMACSHA1withKey:(NSString *)key forString:(NSString *)string;
00023         
00024         @property (retain, nonatomic) NSString *currentErrorString;

00031 + (id)requestWithBucket:(NSString *)bucket path:(NSString *)path
00032 {
00033         ASIS3Request *request = [[[self alloc] initWithURL:[NSURL URLWithString:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"http://%@.s3.amazonaws.com%@",bucket,path]]] autorelease];
00034         [request setBucket:bucket];
00035         [request setPath:path];
00036         return request;
00037 }
00038 
00039 + (id)PUTRequestForFile:(NSString *)filePath withBucket:(NSString *)bucket path:(NSString *)path
00040 {
00041         ASIS3Request *request = [self requestWithBucket:bucket path:path];
00042         [request setPostBodyFilePath:filePath];
00043         [request setShouldStreamPostDataFromDisk:YES];
00044         [request setRequestMethod:@"PUT"];
00045         [request setMimeType:[ASIHTTPRequest mimeTypeForFileAtPath:filePath]];
00046         return request;
00047 }
00048 
00049 + (id)DELETERequestWithBucket:(NSString *)bucket path:(NSString *)path
00050 {
00051         ASIS3Request *request = [self requestWithBucket:bucket path:path];
00052         [request setRequestMethod:@"DELETE"];
00053         return request;
00054 }
00055 
00056 + (id)COPYRequestFromBucket:(NSString *)sourceBucket path:(NSString *)sourcePath toBucket:(NSString *)bucket path:(NSString *)path
00057 {
00058         ASIS3Request *request = [self requestWithBucket:bucket path:path];
00059         [request setRequestMethod:@"PUT"];
00060         [request setSourceBucket:sourceBucket];
00061         [request setSourcePath:sourcePath];
00062         return request;
00063 }
00064 
00065 + (id)HEADRequestWithBucket:(NSString *)bucket path:(NSString *)path
00066 {
00067         ASIS3Request *request = [self requestWithBucket:bucket path:path];
00068         [request setRequestMethod:@"HEAD"];
00069         return request;
00070 }

00072 - (void)dealloc
00073 {
00074         [bucket release];
00075         [path release];
00076         [dateString release];
00077         [mimeType release];
00078         [accessKey release];
00079         [secretAccessKey release];
00080         [sourcePath release];
00081         [sourceBucket release];
00082         [super dealloc];
00083 }

00086 - (void)setDate:(NSDate *)date
00087 {
00088         NSDateFormatter *dateFormatter = [[[NSDateFormatter alloc] init] autorelease];
00089         // Prevent problems with dates generated by other locales (tip from: http://rel.me/t/date/)
00090         [dateFormatter setLocale:[[[NSLocale alloc] initWithLocaleIdentifier:@"en_US_POSIX"] autorelease]];
00091         [dateFormatter setDateFormat:@"EEE, d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z"];
00092         [self setDateString:[dateFormatter stringFromDate:date]];       
00093 }
00094 
00095 - (ASIHTTPRequest *)HEADRequest
00096 {
00097         ASIS3Request *headRequest = (ASIS3Request *)[super HEADRequest];
00098         [headRequest setAccessKey:[self accessKey]];
00099         [headRequest setSecretAccessKey:[self secretAccessKey]];
00100         [headRequest setPath:[self path]];
00101         [headRequest setBucket:[self bucket]];
00102         return headRequest;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 - (void)buildRequestHeaders
00107 {
00108         [super buildRequestHeaders];
00109 
00110         // If an access key / secret access key haven't been set for this request, let's use the shared keys
00111         if (![self accessKey]) {
00112                 [self setAccessKey:[ASIS3Request sharedAccessKey]];
00113         }
00114         if (![self secretAccessKey]) {
00115                 [self setSecretAccessKey:[ASIS3Request sharedSecretAccessKey]];
00116         }
00117         // If a date string hasn't been set, we'll create one from the current time
00118         if (![self dateString]) {
00119                 [self setDate:[NSDate date]];
00120         }
00121         [self addRequestHeader:@"Date" value:[self dateString]];
00122         
00123         // Ensure our formatted string doesn't use '(null)' for the empty path
00124         if (![self path]) {
00125                 [self setPath:@"/"];
00126         }
00127 
00128         NSString *canonicalizedResource = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"/%@%@",[self bucket],[self path]];
00129         
00130         // Add a header for the access policy if one was set, otherwise we won't add one (and S3 will default to private)
00131         NSMutableDictionary *amzHeaders = [[[NSMutableDictionary alloc] init] autorelease];
00132         NSString *canonicalizedAmzHeaders = @"";
00133         if ([self accessPolicy]) {
00134                 [amzHeaders setObject:[self accessPolicy] forKey:@"x-amz-acl"];
00135         }
00136         if ([self sourcePath]) {
00137                 [amzHeaders setObject:[[self sourceBucket] stringByAppendingString:[self sourcePath]] forKey:@"x-amz-copy-source"];
00138         }
00139         for (NSString *key in [amzHeaders keyEnumerator]) {
00140                 canonicalizedAmzHeaders = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@:%@\n",canonicalizedAmzHeaders,[key lowercaseString],[amzHeaders objectForKey:key]];
00141                 [self addRequestHeader:key value:[amzHeaders objectForKey:key]];
00142         }
00143         
00144         
00145         // Jump through hoops while eating hot food
00146         NSString *stringToSign;
00147         if ([[self requestMethod] isEqualToString:@"PUT"] && ![self sourcePath]) {
00148                 [self addRequestHeader:@"Content-Type" value:[self mimeType]];
00149                 stringToSign = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"PUT\n\n%@\n%@\n%@%@",[self mimeType],dateString,canonicalizedAmzHeaders,canonicalizedResource];
00150         } else {
00151                 stringToSign = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@\n\n\n%@\n%@%@",[self requestMethod],dateString,canonicalizedAmzHeaders,canonicalizedResource];
00152         }
00153         NSString *signature = [ASIHTTPRequest base64forData:[ASIS3Request HMACSHA1withKey:[self secretAccessKey] forString:stringToSign]];
00154         NSString *authorizationString = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"AWS %@:%@",[self accessKey],signature];
00155         [self addRequestHeader:@"Authorization" value:authorizationString];
00156         
00157 
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 - (void)requestFinished
00162 {
00163         // COPY requests return a 200 whether they succeed or fail, so we need to look at the XML to see if we were successful.
00164         if ([self responseStatusCode] == 200 && [self sourcePath] && [self sourceBucket]) {
00165                 [self parseError];
00166                 return;
00167         }
00168         if ([self responseStatusCode] < 207) {
00169                 [super requestFinished];
00170                 return;
00171         }
00172         [self parseError];
00173 }
00174 
00175 #pragma mark Error XML parsing
00176 
00177 - (void)parseError
00178 {
00179         NSXMLParser *parser = [[[NSXMLParser alloc] initWithData:[self responseData]] autorelease];
00180         [parser setDelegate:self];
00181         [parser setShouldProcessNamespaces:NO];
00182         [parser setShouldReportNamespacePrefixes:NO];
00183         [parser setShouldResolveExternalEntities:NO];
00184         [parser parse];
00185 
00186 }
00187 
00188 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser parseErrorOccurred:(NSError *)parseError
00189 {
00190         [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIS3ResponseParsingFailedType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Parsing the resposnse failed",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,parseError,NSUnderlyingErrorKey,nil]]];
00191 }
00192 
00193 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser didStartElement:(NSString *)elementName namespaceURI:(NSString *)namespaceURI qualifiedName:(NSString *)qName attributes:(NSDictionary *)attributeDict
00194 {
00195         [self setCurrentErrorString:@""];
00196 }
00197 
00198 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser didEndElement:(NSString *)elementName namespaceURI:(NSString *)namespaceURI qualifiedName:(NSString *)qName
00199 {
00200         if ([elementName isEqualToString:@"Message"]) {
00201                 [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIS3ResponseErrorType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:[self currentErrorString],NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
00202         }
00203 }
00204 
00205 - (void)parser:(NSXMLParser *)parser foundCharacters:(NSString *)string
00206 {
00207         [self setCurrentErrorString:[[self currentErrorString] stringByAppendingString:string]];
00208 }

00237 #pragma mark S3 Authentication helpers
00238 
00239 // From: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/476455/is-there-a-library-for-iphone-to-work-with-hmac-sha-1-encoding
00240 
00241 + (NSData *)HMACSHA1withKey:(NSString *)key forString:(NSString *)string
00242 {
00243         NSData *clearTextData = [string dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00244         NSData *keyData = [key dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00245         
00246         uint8_t digest[CC_SHA1_DIGEST_LENGTH] = {0};
00247         
00248         CCHmacContext hmacContext;
00249         CCHmacInit(&hmacContext, kCCHmacAlgSHA1, keyData.bytes, keyData.length);
00250         CCHmacUpdate(&hmacContext, clearTextData.bytes, clearTextData.length);
00251         CCHmacFinal(&hmacContext, digest);
00252         
00253         return [NSData dataWithBytes:digest length:CC_SHA1_DIGEST_LENGTH];
00254 }
